item.title: [Python] Introduction to Deep Learning-Coding Preparation-
item.description: # Target audience It is a continuation of Last article. This article prepares for coding from now on. If you want to implement it yourself, but it is quite … please take a look. (Basically, I can’t use complicated techniques, so don’t worry.) ** The coding environment is jupyter notebook. ** If you want to manage it at the module level elsewhere, uncomment the command such as import. If it doesn’t work please let me know in the comments… Next article here
